en: You've stumbled across an app suite that seems like it'll help your productivity. Organized checklists and calendar events dance in front of your eyes. Buy it and give it a shot?
It makes you a bit more productive for a week, but you can't figure out how to get the complex mechanics to work for your precise needs. At least it helped!
You've been down this path before. Productivity apps tend to distract more than help. You pass.
